import React from 'react' import './Merchandising.css' import { useRef } from 'react' import pointImg from '../../assets/img/carrerOrange.svg' import triangleImg from '../../assets/img/triangleHautBas.svg' import statImg from '../../assets/img/troisBarres.svg' import { motion,useTransform,useScroll } from "framer-motion" import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; import { useEffect } from 'react' import imgUne from '../../assets/img/mainImage.png' import imgdeux from '../../assets/img/homepage.jpeg' import imgTrois from '../../assets/img/homepage2.jpeg' import imgQuatre from '../../assets/img/stats.png' export default function Merchandising() { const target = useRef(); const {scrollYProgress} = useScroll({ target:target, offset:["0 1","1 1"], }) const opacityParaBase = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.17,0.33],[1,0]); const scaleParaBase = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.17,0.33],["scale(1)","scale(0.75)"]); const bottomParaUn = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0,0.33],["calc(0% - 10px)","calc(100% - 290px)"]); const opacityParaUn = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.50,0.58],[1,0]); const scaleParaUn = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.50,0.66],["scale(1)","scale(0.5)"]); const bottomParaDeux = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.33,0.66],["calc(0% - 78px)","calc(100% - 358px)"]); const opacityParaDeux = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.85,0.92],[1,0]); const scaleParaDeux = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.85,1],["scale(1)","scale(0.5)"]); const bottomParaTrois = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.66,1],["calc(0% - 146px)","calc(100% - 426px)"]); const opacityParaTrois = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.66,1],[0,1]); const opacityImgUne = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.17,0.24],[1,0]); const opacityImg = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.17,0.24],[1,0]); const opacityImgDeux = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.24,0.30,0.45,0.56],[0,1,1,0]); const opacityImgTrois = useTransform(scrollYProgress,[0.60,0.66],[0,1]); return (
The App for

Fashion

Merchandising Depict lets you manage your

collection pages like a professional.

Editorial Merchandising

Manual curation at its finest

Curating products does not have to feel like doing your taxes. View stock status tags and preview your storefront on mobile & desktop.

Strategic Merchandising

Set boosting rules based on tags, collections, and dynamic groups

Organically boost key products across all collections. Or set rules to buty & hide products when needed.

Analytics

Auto-generated merchandising analytics

The easiest way for brands to be date-driven by tracking sales and stocj data for products and collections.

) }
